metadata.name: !!Better Minimap
metadata.description: [h1]Mod description[/h1] This mod trims out a lot of the thick borders from the minimap and even includes support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635]MiniMAPI[/url]. For a high contrast take on the same mod, check out the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2535623301]Better Minimap ~White~[/url].
